data.title: Parallel benchmark expansion: industry + internal suites with unified scoreboard

data.body: Implemented full parallel benchmark expansion. Added runners: src/analysis/memoryarena-slice.ts, src/analysis/memoryagentbench-slice.ts, src/analysis/internal-cross-session.ts, src/analysis/internal-multi-agent.ts, src/analysis/internal-scale-ladder.ts, src/analysis/internal-backbone-matrix.ts, plus orchestrator src/analysis/parallel-benchmarks.ts and aggregator src/analysis/parallel-scoreboard.ts. Executed all tracks in parallel via bun src/analysis/parallel-benchmarks.ts. Final unified report: docs/research/parallel-benchmark-scoreboard.md. Latest manifest: results/parallel-benchmarks-manifest-1772146260041-latest.json. Key artifacts: results/longmemeval-slice-1772146064700.json, results/memoryarena-slice-1772145997802.json, results/memoryagentbench-slice-1772146202754.json, results/internal-cross-session-1772146247158.json, results/internal-multi-agent-1772145887217.json, results/internal-scale-ladder-1772145821637.json, results/internal-backbone-matrix-1772145802060.json.

## Review (agent:gpt5-reviewer)
Cold review scope: new benchmark runners + orchestrator + scoreboard only.

Reviewed files:
- src/analysis/memoryarena-slice.ts
- src/analysis/memoryagentbench-slice.ts
- src/analysis/internal-cross-session.ts
- src/analysis/internal-multi-agent.ts
- src/analysis/internal-scale-ladder.ts
- src/analysis/internal-backbone-matrix.ts
- src/analysis/parallel-benchmarks.ts
- src/analysis/parallel-scoreboard.ts
- docs/research/parallel-benchmark-scoreboard.md

Validation:
- Executed full parallel run successfully (7 tracks) and produced manifest + report.
- Re-ran MemoryAgentBench slice with context trimming to eliminate prior EventQA runtime errors.
- Re-ran cross-session benchmark to ensure both strategies produce scored output.
- Re-generated unified scoreboard from latest-manifest artifacts.

Verdict: PASS.
Residual risks: industry tracks are bounded proxy adapters rather than official end-to-end benchmark pipelines; backbone matrix is constrained by model availability in provider routing.

Completed parallel implementation and execution of all requested benchmark tracks (3 industry + 4 internal), including orchestrated parallel runs and unified scoreboard generation. Artifacts and caveats documented in task comments. Final report: docs/research/parallel-benchmark-scoreboard.md.
